```{r}
packages = c('tidyverse', 'sf', 'tmap', 'lubridate','sftime','clock','rmarkdown' )

for(p in packages){
  if(!require(p,character.only= T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p,character.only=T)
}
```

```{r}
schools <- read_sf("data/wkt/Schools.csv", 
                   options = "GEOM_POSSIBLE_NAMES=location")
```

```{r}
buildings <- read_sf("data/wkt/Buildings.csv", 
                   options = "GEOM_POSSIBLE_NAMES=location")
Apartments <- read_sf("data/wkt/Apartments.csv", 
                   options = "GEOM_POSSIBLE_NAMES=location")
Pubs <- read_sf("data/wkt/Pubs.csv", 
                   options = "GEOM_POSSIBLE_NAMES=location")
Restaurants <- read_sf("data/wkt/Restaurants.csv", 
                   options = "GEOM_POSSIBLE_NAMES=location")
Employers <- read_sf("data/wkt/Employers.csv", 
                   options = "GEOM_POSSIBLE_NAMES=location")
```

```{r}
tmap_mode("view")
tm_shape(buildings)+
tm_polygons(col = "grey60",
           size = 1,
           border.col = "black",
           border.lwd = 1)
tmap_mode("plot")
```
```{r}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(buildings)+
tm_polygons(col = "grey60",
           size = 1,
           border.col = "black",
           border.lwd = 1) +
tm_shape(Employers) +
  tm_dots(col = "red")
```

```{r echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
logs <- read_sf("data/wkt/ParticipantStatusLogs1.csv", 
                options = "GEOM_POSSIBLE_NAMES=currentLocation")
```

```{r echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
logs_selected <- logs %>%
  mutate(Timestamp = date_time_parse(timestamp,zone ="",format = "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S")) %>%
  mutate(day = get_day(Timestamp)) %>%
  filter(currentMode == "Transport")
```

```{r echo=FALSE,eval=FALSE}
write_rds(logs_selected,"data/rds/logs_selected.rds")
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
logs_selected <-read_rds("data/rds/logs_selected.rds")
```

```{r}
hex <- st_make_grid(buildings, 
                    cellsize=100, 
                    square=FALSE) %>%
  st_sf() %>%
  rowid_to_column('hex_id')
plot(hex)
```

```{r}
points_in_hex <- st_join(logs_selected, 
                         hex, 
                         join=st_within)
#plot(points_in_hex, pch='.')
```

```{r}
points_in_hex <- st_join(logs_selected, 
                        hex, 
                        join=st_within) %>%
  st_set_geometry(NULL) %>%
  count(name='pointCount', hex_id)
head(points_in_hex)
```
```{r}
hex_combined <- hex %>%
  left_join(points_in_hex, 
            by = 'hex_id') %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0)
```

```{r}
tm_shape(hex_combined %>%
           filter(pointCount > 0))+
  tm_fill("pointCount",
          n = 8,
          style = "quantile") +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.1)
```

```{r}
logs_path <- logs_selected %>%
  group_by(participantId, day) %>%
  summarize(m = mean(Timestamp), 
            do_union=FALSE) %>%
  st_cast("LINESTRING")
```

```{r}
logs_path_selected <- logs_path %>%
  filter(participantId==0)
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(buildings)+tm_polygons(col = "grey60",size = 1,border.col = "black",border.lwd = 1)+tm_shape(logs_path_selected) +tm_lines(col = "blue")
tmap_mode("plot")
```
